title: Queen Elizabeth says Camilla should be 'queen consort' when Charles becomes king
content:
1. Queen Elizabeth says Camilla should be 'queen consort' when Charles becomes king  NBC News
  2. Prince Charles 'deeply conscious' of Queen Elizabeth's wish that his wife Camilla someday be called Queen  Fox News
  3. We’ll have King Charles and Queen Camilla – but not just yet  The Independent
  4. Thank you Your Majesty for saying what we have all been thinking – of course Camilla should become Queen  Royal Central
  5. Elizabeth II marks Platinum Jubilee with 'Queen Camilla' announcement  Bangkok Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Queen Elizabeth says Camilla should be 'queen consort' when Charles becomes king  NBC News
